name: Untitled document copy.docx
extractedText:
Virginia and Pennsylvania Matching Requirements







Virginia and Pennsylvania do not require insurance companies to take into account that the products must match.  That would only apply if the homeowner had a matching endorsement on their policy.  



However, there are still plenty of arguments to use outside of matching requirements:

Repairability (using Brittle Test or Repair Attempt)

Differing dimensions not allowing for a proper repair

Missed storm damage to the areas not yet approved for replacement

Other possibilities based on other information that has not yet been provided
